article.title: Loading New XML Files
article.introduction: Loading a new XML file into Xopus can be accomplished using the Editor.setURL function.
article.paragraph: ​The menu on the right uses a very simple line of code to load new XML documents into Xopus, here.
First the frame where Xopus is running is found, to find the Editor object. Then a url is passed to it, using setURL. The urls of the links in the menu look like this:
As you can see, the island is reloaded with a new parameter.
